title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a difference in formatting between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed differently in the dynamic text item and the data/text item. The dynamic text item shows a different format for the datetime values compared to the data/text item.
EB: Expected Behavior: When retrieving datetime values from a table, both the dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the same format for the datetime values.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add three items to a table, one dynamic text item, one data item, and one text item.
2. Set the content of all three items to new Date().
3. Save the changes.
4. Preview the table.

Actual Result:
The data and text item display the datetime values in the same format, however, the dynamic text item displays the datetime values in a different format compared to the data and text item.
